title: New Zealand v England: third men’s cricket one-day international – live
summary: Writers provide live updates from the third ODI between New Zealand and England in Wellington. Fans can follow the match's progress with an over-by-over report. Tune in for the latest highlights and key moments.

title: Britain one of least ‘nature-connected’ nations in world – with Nepal the most
summary: A recent study of 61 countries shows that Canada, Germany, Israel, Japan, and Spain rank near the bottom in performance. This indicates potential issues in various sectors assessed in the report. The findings highlight the need for improvement in these nations.

title: UN expert urged to investigate Lebanon over alleged torture of Egyptian-Turkish poet
summary: Abdulrahman al-Qaradawi has been in prison in the UAE for nearly a year due to his criticism of the governments of the UAE, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia. His detention highlights ongoing tensions regarding dissent in the region. Activists have raised concerns about freedom of expression in the Gulf states.

title: Girlbands Forever: this shocking history of 90s female pop is packed with gossip, scandal – and bangers
summary: A new musical documentary promises a nostalgic journey through classic hits, showcasing candid interviews with artists. These discussions reveal troubling aspects of the record industry. Expect a blend of cherished memories and unsettling truths about music's inner workings.

title: I skied up to the highest mountain hut in the Swedish Arctic. My reward? A whiteout …
summary: A remarkable train journey to Sweden's Arctic north culminates in an extraordinary skiing adventure. Amidst a snowstorm, travelers enjoy a cozy breakfast of waffles. This unique experience blends natural beauty with culinary delight.
